leather.description: Leather provides sturdy protection against light weapons.

craft_menu.description: Handles leather tanning and meat butchering.

perks.l1_description: The Trapper is able to build tannery facilities, extract tannins, dry fresh hides and prepare pelts.

block.description: Used by the Trapper for cleaning pelts.
block.recipe_description: Required for cleaning pelts and turning them into leather.

tanning_tub.description: Used to tan rawhide into leather. Should be kept away due to its foul smell!
tanning_tub.recipe_description: Used to tan rawhide into leather.
tanning_tub.flavor: Tanneries are usually built on the outskirts of towns due to their... particular smell.
tanning_tub.water_description: This tub requires tannin to be functional again.

drying_frame.description: Used to dry fresh large hides into useful pelts and skins.
drying_frame.recipe_description: Required for drying pelts and skins for later tanning.
drying_frame.flavor: It is NOT a jumping bed!

small_drying_frame.description: Can simultaneously dry up to eight small hides into useful pelts and skins.
small_drying_frame.recipe_description: Required for drying small pelts for later tanning.

input_rack_thin_leather.recipe_description: Provide your tannery with a special stockpile for recently finished leather.
input_rack_thin_leather.flavor: Holds up to 20 sheets of thin leather

input_rack_pelt_large.recipe_description: Supply your crafters with a pile of large pelts straight from the drying frames.

input_rack_pelt_small.recipe_description: Supply your crafters with a rack of small pelts ready for use.

output_rack_rawhide.recipe_description: An efficient storage for recently clean pelts to be stored before they can be tanned.

racoon_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hat for a small speed and diligence increase.
racoon_hat.worn_description: Slightly increasing the Trapper's speed and diligence.
racoon_hat.flavor: 'Ain't no thing like me, 'cept me!' - Rocket Raccoon

rabbit_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hat for a good compassion bonus and a small speed increase.
rabbit_hat.worn_description: Increasing the Trapper's compassion and slightly increasing speed.

squirrel_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hat for a small speed increase.

wolf_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hood for a good speed increase.

cougar_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hood for a good speed and diligence increase.
cougar_hat.worn_description: Increasing the Trapper's speed and diligence.
cougar_hat.flavor: Only a master of the hunt can wear this.

smokehouse.description: Smokehouses are useful for curing products like meat with smoke.
smokehouse.recipe_description: A smokehouse can be used to cure certain products like raw meats or sausages into edible and preserved forms.
smokehouse.unlit_description: It has run out of fuel and needs to be lit again before it can work!

campfire_pot.description: Used by the Trapper to boil, render and cook.
campfire_pot.recipe_description: Required for boiling, rendering and simple cooking.
campfire_pot.flavor: The pot is a very useful survival tool

rc_smokehouse.description: Smokehouses are useful for curing products like meat with smoke.
rc_smokehouse.unlit_description: It has run out of fuel and needs to be lit again before it can work!

na_smokehouse.description: Smokehouses are useful for curing products like meat with smoke.
na_smokehouse.unlit_description: It has run out of fuel and needs to be lit again before it can work!

salt_box.description: Prepared by the Trapper for curing a variety of products with salt.
salt_box.recipe_description: Can be used for curing a variety of products with salt.
salt_box.flavor: Salted goods can be further cured in a smokehouse for the best results!
salt_box.dirty_description: It's all dirty and humid. The salt must be replaced before it can be used again.

fox_hat.worn_description: Slightly increasing the Trapper's speed and diligence.
fox_hat.description: Trappers can wear this hat for a small speed and diligence increase.

shop_info.name: Salt Mine Workers
shop_info.title: Some workers from a local salt mine have arrived

shop_info.name: Salt Mines of Angor
shop_info.title: A trader from a big salt mine has arrived

shop_info.name: Cirdain's Salt Quarry
shop_info.title: A caravan from a famous salt mine is here for business

tanning_tub_stench.tooltip: Everyone can notice, can't they? Are they looking? I smell awful... I should really stay away from those horrid tanning tubs!

smoky_flavors.description:
Mmmm, this was perfectly cured. So hearty! Stamina, Courage and Muscle are increased.
  • Crafting is slightly faster

tanning_tub.description: Order the Trapper to refill this vat and add another Pinch of Tannin to it so it can be used to tan hides again. This command is automatically issued whenever the tub needs it.

smokehouse.description: Order the Trapper to bring any common fuel and light the smokery again. They must be able to access the backside opening to light the fire. This command is automatically issued when needed.

salt_box.description: Order the Trapper to clean this salt box and replace the humid, dirty salt. This command will be issued automatically when needed.

rawhide.description: Rawhide can be tanned into leather using a tanning tub.
rawhide.recipe_description: Unhair and degrease a dried animal hide to prepare it for tanning. Produces two pieces of rawhide.
rawhide.small_recipe_description: Unhair and degrease a dried animal hide to prepare it for tanning.

tannin.description: Milled from organics like wood, bark or leaves. Used in leather tanning.
tannin.recipe_description: Tannins are used by Trappers to create tanning tubs where leather can be turned into rawhide.
tannin.chestnut_recipe_description: A more advanced and efficient extraction technique, producing two pinches.
tannin.chestnut_flavor: Chestnut wood chips can be boiled to extract their tannins

fresh_pelt.description: Eww! Recently skinned, requires drying before being of any use.

fresh_varanus_pelt.description: Eww! Scaly and rough, requires drying.

fresh_zilla_pelt.description: Eww! Scaly, rough and somewhat warm to the touch, requires drying.

thin_leather.description: Supple but not so strong. Can be woven into stronger bolts by a Weaver.
thin_leather.recipe_description: Prepared sheets of leather, ready to be put to good use.
thin_leather.flavor: A Trapper can tan pelts into thin leather

scaly_leather.description: Full of hardened, flexible scales. Can be woven into stronger bolts by a Weaver.

raw_skin.description: Raw skin can be tanned into scaly leather using a tanning tub.
raw_skin.recipe_description: Degrease and treat a dried animal scaly skin to prepare it for tanning. Produces two pieces of raw skin.
raw_skin.small_recipe_description: Degrease and treat a dried animal scaly skin to prepare it for tanning.

scaly_leather_boots.description: Fairly resistant scaly leather boots that grants Workers a minor speed bonus.

scaly_leather_bolt.recipe_description: Prepared sheets of scaly leather, ready to be put to good use.
scaly_leather_bolt.flavor: Scaly animals like the Varanus will provide scaly leather

animal_fat.description: Eww. It smells bad and looks gross!
animal_fat.recipe_description: Use a knife to trim the fat from a large piece of raw meat.
animal_fat.flavor: Eww. It smells bad and looks gross!

input_rack_pelt_large.description: A special place for supplying your crafters with a pile of large pelts.

input_rack_pelt_small.description: A wall-mounted rack for small pelts to be easily stored.

input_rack_thin_leather.description: A resting place for your thin leather as soon as it leaves the tub.

output_rack_rawhide.description: A dry place for clean pelts to wait before the tanning tub.

fur_pile.description: Can be harvested for up to 48 fur pelts.
fur_pile.iconic_description: Place it so it can be harvested for fur pelts.
fur_pile.flavor: Very useful for stockpiling pelts or simply trading them in bulk

fur_pile_small.description: Can be harvested for up to 6 fur pelts.
fur_pile_small.iconic_description: Place it so it can be harvested for fur pelts.
fur_pile_small.flavor: Very useful for stockpiling pelts or simply trading them in bulk

input_bin_boiled_leather.description: A supply container, for quicker crafting.
input_bin_boiled_leather.recipe_description: A versatile container that Hearthlings will try to keep full, so your crafters can keep on working!

boiled_leather_chest.recipe_description: For beautifully storing up to 32 items.

boiled_leather_chest_small.recipe_description: For beautifully storing up to 16 items.

salt.description: A common seasoning also useful for preserving and curing.
salt.recipe_description: Grind rock salt into a versatile seasoning also useful for preserving and curing.
salt.flavor: Preservation and curing with salt is handled by the Trapper

salt_smoked.description: An exquisite seasoning with a very bold flavor.

smoked_almond_basket.description: Softly cooked nuts with a smoky flavor.

smoked_chestnut_basket.description: Very popular and delicious smoked nuts, a nice treat during the winter.

smoked_hazelnut_basket.description: Flavorful nuts with a touch of smoke.

smoked_nuts_basket.description: An exquisite and diverse mix of smoked nuts.

smoked_walnut_basket.description: Hard outside, tender inside, with a spicy flavor of smoke.

smoked_cheese_aged.description: A delicious and firm cheese with a very strong flavor.

smoked_cheese_fresh.description: A soft cheese, almost creamy inside, with a salty taste.

smoked_cheese_mild.description: A firm, mild cheese with a fudgy taste and a sweet finish.

clump_of_rock_salt.description: Has a nice shine. Can be milled into fine salt, a seasoning.

beeswax.description: Malleable yet tough, the incredible work of bees. Can be used as a fine wax.

wax_vegetable.description: A soft and easy to mold organic product. Can be used as a poor wax.
wax_vegetable.flavor: Waxy plants are common in the desert or dry regions

wax_wool.description: Greasy and firm wax boiled from the wooly coat of a sheep. Can be used as fine wax.
wax_wool.flavor: The waxy grease of sheep wool helps them keep warm and dry

dwarfsbeard_bundle.description: Very tangled, greasy and rough. Can be used as thatching, fiber or a source of wax.

boiled_leather.description: Able to harden and quite resistant, this leather can be intricately molded.

boiled_leather_cuirass.description: A durable yet lighter alternative for a knight's armor of choice.

boiled_leather_helmet.description: Resistant and fashionable, perfect for a knight.

boiled_leather_shield.description: Tough and reliable, a nice shield for a footman.

racoon_spirit.description: Diligence increased by 15 and Speed Increased by 10

rabbit_spirit.description: Compassion increased by 25 and Speed Increased by 10

tanning_tub.description: The smokes coming out of this tub are fetid and smell awful!

tanning_tub_stench.description: One shouldn't hang around the tanning vats for so long...

fox_spirit.description: Diligence increased by 15 and Speed Increased by 10

tannery_sign.description: A sign with the mark of the Trapper.

plushie_dragon.description: A bit fluffier than the original.

boar_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a boar.

cougar_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a cougar.

deer_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a deer.

fox_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a fox.

wolf_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a wolf.

bear_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a bear.

moomoo_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of a moo-moo.

wild_cattle_rug.description: Make a comfy rug with the prepared fur of wild cattle.

raw_meat.description: Not good for consumption, needs curing in a smokery or usage in cooking!
raw_meat.decay_1_description: It's rotting! Better use it quickly before it is gone...

recipes.pork_description: Produces four units of raw pork cuts that can be used as meat in cooking or smoked into jerky.
recipes.mutton_description: Produces two units of raw mutton cuts that can be used as meat in cooking or smoked into jerky.
recipes.venison_description: Produces three units of raw venison cuts that can be used as meat in cooking or smoked into jerky.
recipes.steak_description: Produces two units of raw beef cuts that can be used as meat in cooking or smoked into jerky.

raw_small_meat.description: Not good for consumption, needs curing in a smokery or usage in cooking!

recipes.varanus_description: Produces three units of raw varanus cuts that can be used as meat in cooking or smoked into jerky.

raw_white_meat.description: Not good for consumption, needs curing in a smokery or usage in cooking!

recipes.poyo_description: Produces two units of raw poyo cuts that can be used as meat in cooking or smoked into jerky.
recipes.poultry_description: Produces three units of raw poultry cuts that can be used as meat in cooking or smoked into jerky.
recipes.fish_description: Produces two units of fish meat that can be used as meat in cooking or smoked into jerky.
recipes.fish_big_description: Produces three units of fish meat that can be used as meat in cooking or smoked into jerky.
recipes.fish_big_flavor: No one won't believe how big it was after that!

fish_smoked.description: Stringy and delicious cured white meat!

big_fish_smoked.description: Tasty and healthy, it is a delicious fruit of the labor of a fisherman.

smoked_sausage.description: Tasty, stringy and encased ground meat cured in a smokery.

sausage.description: The trapper can use fibers for a more rustic and practical encasing of sausages.

warm_wolf.description: Perhaps one of the best ideas ever was to put roast sausages inside common bread.
warm_wolf.flavor: Now we only need some kind of sauce...

animal_fat_rendered.description: It still smells odd and looks weird... Can be used as grease in cooking!
animal_fat_rendered.recipe_description: Boil and work this animal fat into an useful, rendered form.
animal_fat_rendered.flavor: Rendered animal fat has several uses like, for example, in cooking as an edible grease

animal_fat_rendered_lard.description: Greasy, flavorful pork fat. Can be used as grease but also as butter!
animal_fat_rendered_lard.recipe_description: Boil and work this animal fat into an useful, rendered form.
animal_fat_rendered_lard.flavor: Known as lard, rendered pork fat can also be used as a spreading, like butter!

animal_fat_rendered_tallow.description: A special kind of fat. Can be used as grease, cooking oil and even as poor wax!
animal_fat_rendered_tallow.recipe_description: Boil and work this animal fat into an useful, rendered form.
animal_fat_rendered_tallow.flavor: Tallow has many uses, can be used as oil for deep frying and even as a poor wax

bug_meat_soup.description: Watery and weak but better than nothing.
bug_meat_soup.recipe_description: It's not as good as a stew but should be better than nothing.
bug_meat_soup.flavor: It has boiled bugs and, well... More boiled bugs!

pemmican.description: Not really tasty but very nutritious and long lasting survivalist food.
pemmican.recipe_description: Dried meat ground alongside berries and rendered fat provide a long lasting and nutritious meal for enduring the wilderness.
pemmican.flavor: Conserved in small rawhide sacks, well made pemmican can last years

fish_jerky.description: Thin, crunchy and stringy. Has a peculiar flavor.

rotten_fish_jerky.description: It smells worse than it looks like.

smoked_pork.description: A tender smoked piece of pork meat.

smoked_mutton.description: A crisp and nicely smoked piece of meat.

smoked_poultry.description: Fleshy and tender, smoked poultry meat.

smoked_steak.description: A thin and well smoked steak of meat.

smoked_varanus.description: An exotic and not so tasty meat, smoked.

smoked_venison.description: Delicious wild game smoked to perfection.

smoked_meat.description: Somewhat satisfying cut of tenderly smoked meat.
This has gone bad, no use for it anymore...

salted_meat.description: This has gone bad, no use for it anymore...

smoked_meat_small.description: Small and somewhat satisfying bits of tenderly smoked meat.

salted_meat.description: Very well preserved. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_meat_small.description: Quite salty and dry small cuts of meat. Can be further cured in a smokery.

smoked_fish_meat.description: Nutritious, stringy, but not that flavorful...

rotten_salted_fish_meat.description: This is definitely not worth anymore.

salted_fish_meat.description: Salty and crispy, not so enjoyable. Can be further cured in a smokery.

big_fish_salted.description: Very dry and salty, but still juicy inside! Can be further cured in a smokery.

fish_salted.description: Crisp and dry outside. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_mutton.description: Crispy and nicely salted. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_pork.description: This salted pork is particularly good. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_poultry.description: Hearty and crunchy piece of salted fowl. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_poyo.description: The salty, well preserved chest piece of a poyo. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_sausage.description: Seasoned to perfection, can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_steak.description: Tender and juicy, if not a bit salty... Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_varanus.description: Exotic and tender. Can be further cured in a smokery.

salted_venison.description: A valuable and fancy piece of game meat, can be further cured in a smokery.

big_fish_jerky.description: A deliciously flavored and smoked chunk of fish meat.

whole_fish_jerky.description: A stringy and salty whole fish, very tasty!

jerky_mutton.description: Perfectly salted and smoked rack of meat, ready to be eaten!

jerky_pork.description: A hearty, juicy large bit of smoked pork.

jerky_poultry.description: Well seasoned and smoked fowl meat.

jerky_poyo.description: A refined and tasty poyo breast with a crispy, salty crust.

jerky_varanus.description: Something so bad turned into something so good...

jerky_venison.description: Delicious and flavorful game meat, smoked to perfection.

fur_coat.worn_description: Warm and cozy, keeps the cold away...
fur_coat.description: Workers can wear this to fight off the cold in snowy days.
